title: My Side of Her Story
description: Annika is different and Natalie knows it. It's not long before Natalie realizes her baby has what some would call "a gift". Natalie hurts for her daughter and tries to bury the secret, hiding it from everyone, even her mama and two Tori and Roxy. The secret doesn't hide for long, instead it unravels and with it comes love, betrayal, and a solved murder. This book highlights the bond between women and how great the love from a woman can be. More than anything it focuses on a mother's love and the power it carries with it.
author: Nichole Jaimes
